content: From the next release, the validator and the publisher will start enforcing ImplementationGuide.global profiles. Also from the next release, the publisher will start being explicit in the QA page which profiles it has validated a resource against, and why. You will be able to get the validator to do this using the -crumb-trails parameter
Do we want this set in the template (if so for all IGs or just HL7 ones)?
There's nothing to set in the template
My question is - is this something that should be turned on in the template or configured in the template? If the answer is "it's always on in the IG Publisher", that's fine.
it's always on the in the publisher
